fc-1.question: Analyze this image to determine the product category and log the detected category into the database.

function.name: log_product_category
function.description: Logs the category of a product into the database.

category.description: The category of the product to be logged. This parameter is required.

fc-2.question: Change the background of the website to match the color, material, and other features of the object.

function.name: change_background
function.description: Updates the website's background to reflect the color, material, and additional features of a specified object.

color.description: The primary color of the object's background. This parameter is required.

material.description: The material of the object's background (e.g., wood, metal, fabric). This parameter is required.

features.description: Additional features or patterns to incorporate into the background (e.g., stripes, floral, abstract).

fc-3.question: Analyze the provided image, extract relevant product features, and populate them into a listing site.

function.name: populate_listing
function.description: Populates features into the fields of a listing site.

features.description: A dictionary of extracted product features to populate into the listing site.

additional_features.description: Other optional features such as patterns or styles.
